summary: Implements a diffusion‑based pipeline that performs AI‑driven image inpainting. It validates inputs, preprocesses source images and masks, encodes textual prompts, schedules diffusion steps, applies safety checks, and produces intermediate and final edited images, integrating UNet, CLIP, T5, watermarking, and other utilities.
business_intent: Enable developers and content creators to automatically fill or modify selected regions of images using natural language guidance, facilitating rapid visual editing, creative workflows, and safe generation of edited media.
